Senior Application Developer – J2EE & team lead
* Location: Square One area in Mississauga * Salaray range: 90K * Start date: ASAP * 50% hands-on development and 50% team lead * industry: CRM solution
Overview:
The Senior Application Developer – J2EE is responsible for the Design, Development, Release, and Support of software applications for both internal external clients using J2EE. Work closely with the Solution engineer to define technical requirements and proposed architecture and solution. Provide first level time estimates and work breakdown for input into project plan. Provide mentoring to Domino developers.
Responsibilities: Requirements Gathering Design, implementation and maintenance of applications from given requirements specifications Application detailed design, coding, unit test development and conduct, integration and testing, and system performance assessment Creation of technical documents for system design Maintenance of existing modules and applications. Development of new applications. System Documentation Application security testing. Development of unit tests for new modules developed Reconfigures and extends existing solutions so that new and existing solutions operate as an integrated system Provide Production trouble-shooting analysis & resolution Mentoring Data Analysis and Reporting Technical R&D
Requirements:
College/University Degree 5+ Years Web application development: Understand SLDC principles Able to capture/refine business requirements into technical specifications Able to create test plans from provided business requirements Ability to mentor junior staff 2+ years: Experience in estimating web projects Able to manage cross-disciplinary teams (Java, UI Designer, DBA) Experience with best practices in build & release management in Java/J2EE environment Experienced in J2EE Core Patterns Experienced in various MVC frameworks Experienced in HTML Experienced in CSS Experienced in Javascript Exposure to Spring framework
-------------------- Ronan O'Doherty Business Manager Hays Specialist Recruitment (Canada) Inc.
